home.title: Turn your digital vision into reality
home.description: From Concept to Creation: Custom Web Solutions for Your Business

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Who We Are?
about.intro: Welcome to Kaapo Studio, where every pixel and line of code tells a story. Starting our journey in 2019, we set out with a dream of bringing a fresh and creative approach to the world of web design and software development.
about.vision: Our vision is simple but ambitious: to transform digital ideas into memorable and functional experiences. Our values - innovation, creativity and attention to detail - are the pillars that guide every project.
about.experience: Even though we are just starting out, our team is made up of young but passionate and dedicated professionals, each with unique expertise in their field.
about.commitment: We are always on the lookout for the latest technologies and trends to ensure that our solutions are not only current, but also one step ahead of the competition.

cta.description: If you're ready to bring your digital vision to life, we're here to help. Contact us to discuss your project!

services.title: Services
services.description: From Concept to Creation: Custom Web Solutions for Your Business

list.title: Web Design
list.subTitle: Design-uri captivante care vorbesc audientei dumneavoastra
list.description: Cream site-uri web estetice, intuitive si responsive. Design-ul nostru se concentreaza pe crearea unei experiente utilizator memorabile.

list.title: Dezvoltare Software
list.subTitle: Solutii software agile pentru afacerea moderna
list.description: Dezvoltam aplicatii software personalizate, de la site-uri web la aplicatii mobile, care se integreaza perfect cu operatiunile dumneavoastra.

list.title: Optimizare SEO
list.subTitle: Strategii SEO pentru a va plasa in topul rezultatelor
list.description: Oferim servicii de optimizare SEO care imbunatațesc vizibilitatea online si atrag trafic de calitate spre site-ul tau.

list.title: Mentenanta
list.subTitle: Mentenanta si suport continuu pentru site-ul dumneavoastra
list.description: Oferim servicii de mentenanța web complete pentru a asigura ca site-ul dumneavoastra ramane actualizat, sigur si functional. De la actualizari periodice, backup-uri si securitate, pana la optimizari si suport tehnic, ne asiguram ca platforma dumneavoastra online funcționeaza fara probleme.

list.title: Orange Romania
list.description: Din 2004 si pana in prezent, Orange este liderul industriei de telecomunicatii din Romania, un operator care ofera servicii integrate, cu peste 10 milioane de bani si o cifra de afaceri de 1,23 miliarde de euro in 2021.

list.title: Ruru Dent
list.description: The client has a modern dental clinic where he offers quality services to his patients. Have a team of doctors with experience in the field of dentistry.

list.title: Lumiere Dental Clinic
list.description: Lumiere Dental Clinic, through high quality standards, a team of international doctors, the best quality treatments, the latest generation equipment and technologies, will offer patients premium dental services in the heart of Bucharest.

list.title: vWatch Romania
list.description: vWatch is a Romanian company that sells watches and accessories. They are not an official dealer for the products they sell and have no affiliation with the manufacturers.

list.title: Fitness Geek
list.description: The client has a modern dental clinic where he offers quality services to his patients. Have a team of doctors with experience in the field of dentistry.

list.title: Black on White
list.description: The name of the client is Emilian Alexandru and he is a hairstylist with 15 years of experience, made both in the country and abroad.

list.title: Pro Events
list.description: The client has a modern dental clinic where he offers quality services to his patients. Have a team of doctors with experience in the field of dentistry.

list.blockquote: We collaborated for the creation of a website for MOFT, our villa, with Kaapo Studio and we were extremely pleased with how the collaboration went. Everything was very fast and well put together. Our ideas have been translated into the website as we wanted and I appreciate the help we still get every time we encounter a problem.
Everything was perfect and good experience.

I mean, I'm very happy with the way I interacted with Kaapo Studio. They are a studio with a thought outside the box, he delivered on time all the services I needed and of course the services were just as expected. I recommend with confidence!

Together with Kaapo Studio I managed to create a project I've dreamed about for a long time, namely the online fitness and nutrition platform www.alexanderflorescu.ro. A professional and creative studio, which always comes to complete the project with new solutions and ideas for improving the technical or aesthetic aspects. The level of promptness regarding the maintenance part is above expectations! I highly recommend!

For everyone who desires to start an website and add value to his services, I highly recommend you to choose Kaapo Studio’s services. This studio innovative approach on mixing multiple elements and creating the perfect harmony from header to footer impressed me and made me proud of my website. They add passion in every project and they are very thorough about every single detail. Whatever you order, they deliver on time!
